Interface MiddleFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalMiddleFactory, RemoteMiddleFactory
public interface MiddleFactory
Provide access to middle tier components.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    OrderProcessing
    makeOrderProcessing()
    Return an object to access the order processing system
    StockReader
    makeStockReader()
    Return an object to access the database for read only access
    StockReadWriter
    makeStockReadWriter()
    Return an object to access the database for read/write access

  • Method Details

      instance of StockReader

      StockException - if issue

      Return an object to access the database for read/write access
      Returns:
      instance of StockReadWriter
      Throws:
      StockException - if issue

      OrderException - if issue
